2019-2020 Fiscal Budget

It is our hope that you may easily find any and all information available to the public through the use of our web site. Please feel free to browse through our contents or to contact us if you require further information or cannot find what you are looking for.

The City Secretary is responsible for maintaining the official records of the City. The City Secretary has many responsibilities and among these responsibilities are: preparing the agenda packets for all City Council meeting, hearings, workshops, and prepares minutes thereof for permanent records. The City Secretary maintains ordinances and resolutions and official minutes of the City Council. The office is also responsible for all municipal elections.

All Public Information Requests are submitted to the City Secretary and processed according to the requirements of the Texas Open Records Act
